review: I experienced some issues during installation. It kept telling me that it couldn't connect to wifi. It connected after 3rd time. Also, the parental control passcode (not wifi password) is visible to everyone. So the parental control is pointless.
author: jajabor

review: Love the new fire stick.  It is very user friendly and easy to start watching shows.  I was pleasantly surprised to the seamless integration with AMAZON Cloud Drive, which allows you to watch personal videos and pictures that are uploaded to the cloud.  Also until the iOS remote app is released its easy to use Netflix or AMAZON prime on your iPhone to find shows and then sending it to the TV to watch on big screen.
author: LA Cool

review: Excellent! I bought this while it was on promotion for $20...a really good deal. Relatively easy to connect to the TV...just find the HDMI slot and push in. My TV has two HDMI slots and it did not work in slot #2 but it worked in #1. I connected the power source, installed the batteries on the remote and "it was good to go." It was very difficult to remove the battery cover on the remote, but with patience it finally started to move. If this happens to you, be patient! I get Netflix, Amazon, PBS, and others providers too. I'm a Prime member and a lot of the Amazon "stuff" is included but not all. I was surprised there were still a few programs that demanded payment. I'm very pleased with the Fire Stick!
author: Amazon Customer
